languages.text: {n}Уставившись в пламя, он внезапно заходится смехом.{/n} "Знаешь, сначала ты так мне не понравил{mf|ся|ась}! Прямо очень — надменн{mf|ый|ая}, ведущ{mf|ий|ая} себя так, словно выше всех законов! Выскочка с чужими регалиями, да еще и не слишком-то умн{mf|ый|ая}..." {n}Взгляд арбитра туманится.{/n} "И где только были мои глаза..."

{n}Staring into the flames, he suddenly lets out a laugh.{/n} "You know, you made a poor first impression on me. Terrible, in fact! I thought you were arrogant, behaving as if you were above every law. An upstart wearing another's regalia, and not a very clever one either..." {n}Solomorne's gaze turns distant.{/n} "How could I have been so blind..."
languages.original_text: {n}Уставившись в пламя, он внезапно заходится смехом.{/n} "Знаешь, сначала ты так мне не понравил{mf|ся|ась}! Прямо очень — надменн{mf|ый|ая}, ведущ{mf|ий|ая} себя так, словно выше всех законов! Выскочка с чужими регалиями, да еще и не слишком-то умн{mf|ый|ая}..." {n}Взгляд арбитра туманится.{/n} "И где только были мои глаза..."

I thought you were arrogant, behaving as if you were above every law. An upstart wearing another's regalia, and not a very clever one either..." {n}Solomorne's gaze turns distant.{/n} "How could I have been so blind..."

An upstart wearing another's regalia, and not a very clever one either..." {n}Solomorne's gaze turns distant.{/n} "How could I have been so blind..."

{n}Staring into the flames, he suddenly lets out a laugh.{/n} "You know, you made a poor first impression on me. Terrible, in fact! I thought you were arrogant, behaving as if you were above every law. An upstart wearing another's regalia, and not a very clever one either..." {n}Solomorne's gaze turns distant.{/n} "How could I have been so blind..."

languages.text: {n}炎をじっと見つめながら、彼はふいに笑い声を上げた。{/n}「正直なところ、あなたの第一印象は最悪でした。本当にひどかった！すべての法を超えた存在であるかのように振る舞う、傲慢な奴だと思いました。他人の紋章をまとった、ろくに賢くもない成り上がりだと…」{n}ソロモーンの視線は遠くを見つめるものへと変わった。{/n}「どうしてあんなにも見誤っていたんだろう…」
languages.original_text: {n}Staring into the flames, he suddenly lets out a laugh.{/n} "You know, you made a poor first impression on me. Terrible, in fact! I thought you were arrogant, behaving as if you were above every law. An upstart wearing another's regalia, and not a very clever one either..." {n}Solomorne's gaze turns distant.{/n} "How could I have been so blind..."

traits.locale_text: {n}炎をじっと見つめながら、彼はふいに笑い声を上げた。{/n}「正直なところ、あなたの第一印象は最悪でした。本当にひどかった！すべての法を超えた存在であるかのように振る舞う、傲慢な奴だと思いました。他人の紋章をまとった、ろくに賢くもない成り上がりだと…」{n}ソロモーンの視線は遠くを見つめるものへと変わった。{/n}「どうしてあんなにも見誤っていたんだろう…」

languages.text: {n}Er starrt in die Flammen und lacht plötzlich.{/n} "Wisst Ihr, dass Ihr einen schlechten ersten Eindruck auf mich gemacht habt? Katastrophal sogar! Ich hielt Euch für arrogant, weil Ihr Euch benahmt, als stündet Ihr über allen Gesetzen. Ein Emporkömmling, der das Ornat eines anderen trägt und dabei nicht einmal sonderlich klug ist ..." {n}Solomornes Blick wird entrückt.{/n} "Wie kann ich so blind gewesen sein ...?
languages.original_text: {n}Staring into the flames, he suddenly lets out a laugh.{/n} "You know, you made a poor first impression on me. Terrible, in fact! I thought you were arrogant, behaving as if you were above every law. An upstart wearing another's regalia, and not a very clever one either..." {n}Solomorne's gaze turns distant.{/n} "How could I have been so blind..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er starrt in die Flammen und lacht plötzlich.{/n} "Wisst Ihr, dass Ihr einen schlechten ersten Eindruck auf mich gemacht habt? Katastrophal sogar! Ich hielt Euch für arrogant, weil Ihr Euch benahmt, als stündet Ihr über allen Gesetzen. Ein Emporkömmling, der das Ornat eines anderen trägt und dabei nicht einmal sonderlich klug ist ..." {n}Solomornes Blick wird entrückt.{/n} "Wie kann ich so blind gewesen sein ...?

languages.text: {n}Le regard rivé sur les flammes, il laisse subitement échapper un éclat de rire.{/n} « La première fois que nous nous sommes rencontrés, vous m'avez fait piètre impression, vous savez. Et encore, le mot est faible ! Je vous trouvais affreusement {mf|arrogant|arrogante}, comme si vous étiez au-dessus des lois. {mf|Un vulgaire parvenu doublé d'un usurpateur|Une vulgaire parvenue doublée d'une usurpatrice}, et pas très {mf|malin|maligne} avec ça... » {n}Le regard de Solomorne se fait lointain.{/n} « Comment ai-je pu être aussi aveugle... »
languages.original_text: {n}Staring into the flames, he suddenly lets out a laugh.{/n} "You know, you made a poor first impression on me. Terrible, in fact! I thought you were arrogant, behaving as if you were above every law. An upstart wearing another's regalia, and not a very clever one either..." {n}Solomorne's gaze turns distant.{/n} "How could I have been so blind..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le regard rivé sur les flammes, il laisse subitement échapper un éclat de rire.{/n} « La première fois que nous nous sommes rencontrés, vous m'avez fait piètre impression, vous savez. Et encore, le mot est faible ! Je vous trouvais affreusement {mf|arrogant|arrogante}, comme si vous étiez au-dessus des lois. {mf|Un vulgaire parvenu doublé d'un usurpateur|Une vulgaire parvenue doublée d'une usurpatrice}, et pas très {mf|malin|maligne} avec ça... » {n}Le regard de Solomorne se fait lointain.{/n} « Comment ai-je pu être aussi aveugle... »

languages.text: {n}El Arbitrator observa detenidamente las llamas y de repente rompe a reír.{/n} «¿Sabe? La primera vez que {mf|lo|la} vi no me causó buena impresión. ¡Incluso la calificaría de terrible! Me pareció arrogante, se comportaba como si estuviese por encima de toda ley. {mf|Un advenedizo|Una advenediza} con un título que no merecía y, de remate, no demasiado inteligente...». {n}La mirada de Solomorne se pierde en el horizonte.{/n} «Cómo pude estar tan ciego...».
languages.original_text: {n}Staring into the flames, he suddenly lets out a laugh.{/n} "You know, you made a poor first impression on me. Terrible, in fact! I thought you were arrogant, behaving as if you were above every law. An upstart wearing another's regalia, and not a very clever one either..." {n}Solomorne's gaze turns distant.{/n} "How could I have been so blind..."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Arbitrator observa detenidamente las llamas y de repente rompe a reír.{/n} «¿Sabe? La primera vez que {mf|lo|la} vi no me causó buena impresión. ¡Incluso la calificaría de terrible! Me pareció arrogante, se comportaba como si estuviese por encima de toda ley. {mf|Un advenedizo|Una advenediza} con un título que no merecía y, de remate, no demasiado inteligente...». {n}La mirada de Solomorne se pierde en el horizonte.{/n} «Cómo pude estar tan ciego...».

languages.text: {n}他凝视着熊熊燃烧的火焰，突然大笑起来。{/n}“说真的，我对你的第一印象不太好，或者说，其实相当糟糕！我以为你是个傲慢自大的家伙，总摆出一副凌驾于一切法律之上的样子。我以为你是个戴着别人皇冠的暴发户，看起来也不怎么聪明……”{n}索罗蒙的目光望向了远方。{/n}“我怎么能这么有眼无珠……”
languages.original_text: {n}Staring into the flames, he suddenly lets out a laugh.{/n} "You know, you made a poor first impression on me. Terrible, in fact! I thought you were arrogant, behaving as if you were above every law. An upstart wearing another's regalia, and not a very clever one either..." {n}Solomorne's gaze turns distant.{/n} "How could I have been so blind..."

traits.locale_text: {n}他凝视着熊熊燃烧的火焰，突然大笑起来。{/n}“说真的，我对你的第一印象不太好，或者说，其实相当糟糕！我以为你是个傲慢自大的家伙，总摆出一副凌驾于一切法律之上的样子。我以为你是个戴着别人皇冠的暴发户，看起来也不怎么聪明……”{n}索罗蒙的目光望向了远方。{/n}“我怎么能这么有眼无珠……”

languages.text: {n}Alevlerden gözünü ayırmadan birden kahkaha koparıyor.{/n} "İlk başta seni hiç sevmemiştim. Nefret ettim hatta! Kendini bütün kanunların fevkinde sanan bir küstah, başkalarının kıyafetlerine bürünmüş sonradan görme bir budala gibi gelmiştin bana." {n}Solomorne uzaklara bakıyor.{/n} "Nasıl bu denli kör olabilmişim?"
languages.original_text: {n}Staring into the flames, he suddenly lets out a laugh.{/n} "You know, you made a poor first impression on me. Terrible, in fact! I thought you were arrogant, behaving as if you were above every law. An upstart wearing another's regalia, and not a very clever one either..." {n}Solomorne's gaze turns distant.{/n} "How could I have been so blind..."

Kendinizi bütün kanunların fevkinde sanan bir küstah, başkalarının kıyafetlerine bürünmüş sonradan görme bir budala gibi gelmiştiniz bana." {n}Solomorne uzaklara bakar.{/n} "Nasıl bu denli kör olabilmişim?"

I thought you were arrogant, behaving as if you were above every law. An upstart wearing another's regalia, and not a very clever one either..." {n}Solomorne's gaze turns distant.{/n} "How could I have been so blind..."
